name: BreakpointManager
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager
description:
BreakpointManager

Responsible for querying Stackdriver Debugger service for any active breakpoints and keep an accurate local copies of the breakpoints.

It correctly remembers which breakpoints are currently active and watched by the debugger agent, and which breakpoints are already completed. The BreakpointManager holds the record of truth for debugger breakpoints

methods.name: app_root
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#app_root
methods.description: Application root directory, in absolute file path form.

methods.name: on_breakpoints_change
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#on_breakpoints_change
methods.description: Callback function invoked when new breakpoints are added or removed

methods.name: on_breakpoints_change=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#on_breakpoints_change=
methods.description: Callback function invoked when new breakpoints are added or removed

methods.name: sync_active_breakpoints
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#sync_active_breakpoints
methods.description: Sync active breakpoints with Stackdriver Debugger service for a given debuggee application. Each request to the debugger service returns the full list of all active breakpoints. This method makes sure the local cache of active breakpoints is consistent with server breakpoints set.

returns.description: True if synced successfully; otherwise false.

methods.name: update_breakpoints
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#update_breakpoints
methods.description:
Update the local breakpoints cache with a list of server active breakpoints. New breakpoints will be added to local cache, and deleted breakpoints will be removed from local cache.

It also correctly identifies evaluated active breakpoints from the server set of breakpoints, and does not re-add such evaluated breakpoints to the active list again.

params.name: server_breakpoints
params.description: List of active breakpoints from Stackdriver Debugger service

methods.name: mark_off
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#mark_off
methods.description: Mark a given active breakpoint as completed. Meaning moving it from list of active breakpoints to completed breakpoints.

params.name: breakpoint
params.description:
The breakpoint
to remove from local cache

returns.description:
The same
breakpoint if successfully marked off as completed. Nil if
this breakpoint isn’t found in the list of active breakpoints or
failed to mark off as completed.

methods.name: breakpoints
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#breakpoints
methods.description: Get a list of all breakpoints, both active and completed.

methods.name: completed_breakpoints
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#completed_breakpoints
methods.description: Get a list of all completed breakpoints.

returns.description:
A list of all
completed breakpoints.

methods.name: active_breakpoints
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#active_breakpoints
methods.description: Get a list of all active breakpoints.

returns.description:
A list of all
active breakpoints.

methods.name: all_complete?
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#all_complete?
methods.description: Check whether any active breakpoints haven’t been completed yet.

returns.description:
True if no more active breakpoints are left. False
otherwise.

methods.name: clear_breakpoints
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
BreakpointManager#clear_breakpoints
methods.description: Clear local breakpoints cache. Remove all active and completed breakpoints
